text: Jacques Jean Marie Rogge, Count Rogge (; ; 2 May 1942 - 29 August 2021) was a Belgian sports administrator and physician. He was the eighth President of the International Olympic Committee (IOC) from 2001 to 2013. In 2013, the IOC announced that Rogge would become their Honorary President. Rogge died on 29 August 2021 in Deinze, Belgium from problems caused by Parkinson's disease, aged 79.Jacques Rogge: aimabel, onkreukbaar en met fair play in al zijn haarvaten ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Belgian nobility Category:Olympians for Belgium Category:Belgian physicians Category:Belgian Roman Catholics Category:Sportspeople from Ghent Category:Scientists from Ghent Category:Presidents of the International Olympic Committee Category:Rugby union players Category:Sailors Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Sports executives and administrators
title: Jacques Rogge
